# Test Solution

This is a test solution used for automated testing of the SenseCraft Solution platform.

## Features

- **Unit Testing**: Supports pytest-based unit tests
- **Integration Testing**: Supports API integration tests
- **CI/CD**: Runs in GitHub Actions workflows

## Use Cases

| Scenario | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| Unit Tests | Test Pydantic models and utility functions |
| API Tests | Test FastAPI endpoints |
| E2E Tests | Test full deployment flow |
